Maned Wolf 
Chrysocyon brachyurus 
Near Threatened
Grasslands with scattered bushes and trees 
South America
Argentina, Brazil, Bolivia, Peru, Paraguay 
The maned wolf is a large canine of South America. It is found in Argentina, Brazil, Bolivia, Peru, and Paraguay. Its markings resemble those of foxes but it is neither a fox nor a wolf. It is the only species in the genus Chrysocyon (meaning “golden dog”).
